body: You've seen the NBA Predictions Model, now it's time to feast on our Free NCAAB Picks. One of our business partners is an elite statitician that has been a professional sports bettor for over 10 years. He's a jet. And so are his models. We'll expand on the data sources, variables and logic (without giving away the exact recipe) in a few weeks. But for now, enjoy free NCAAB picks that shouldn't be free. - - - ## **Today's Free NCAAB Picks** Excuse the raw formatting. We'll have these automated and pretty as soon as possible. ![nba predictions from bet refinery](/images/uploads/nba-predictions-29-jan.png "nba predictions from bet refinery") - - - ## **NBA Player Predictions** Our Model has player outputs too. From expected points, assists and rebounds. To minutes, field goals, blocks, steals. Everything you need to get an edge in DFS or snipe the sportsbooks with prop bets. Our Model even knows each player's defensive matchup. So when a SF is up against Kawhi, he'll have different outputs from when he faces Brandon Ingram. This information is elite and we're only just getting started. ![nba player predictions](/images/uploads/nba-player-predictions-29-jan-1.png "nba player predictions") ![nba player predictions 2](/images/uploads/nba-player-predictions-29-jan-2.png "nba player predictions 2") ![nba player predictions 3](/images/uploads/nba-player-predictions-29-jan-3.png "nba player predictions 3") ![nba player predictions 4](/images/uploads/nba-player-predictions-29-jan-4.png "nba player predictions 4") ![nba player predictions 5](/images/uploads/nba-player-predictions-29-jan-5.png "nba player predictions 5") - - - ### **Want more insight? Get the weekly email.** ### **We promise it's worth your time.** ###
